_source.text: After all, in a league in which almost everyone will have a new quarterback - and those who aren't new all have their issues - and parity is already the norm, maybe a coin flip is better.

text: After all, in a league in which almost everyone will have a new quarterback - and those who aren't new all have their issues - and parity is already the **norm**, maybe a **coin** flip **is** **better**.
